summary: ARE TIRES WITH  LT LEGAL TO INSTALL ON TRAILERS MOST EVERY THING I HAVE READ STATED TRAILERS SHOULD HAVE  TIRES THAT STARTED WITH   ST ,  THERE WERE  TOO MANY TIRE FAILURES ON TIRES THAT HAVE BEEN INSTALLED ON TRAILERS THAT STARTED WITH LT, AND THE MANUFACTURER STATED THEY WERE LEGAL.. LT TIRE 10 PLY HAS 2 PLY SIDEWALL, ST 10 PLY TIRE HAS 4 PLY SIDEWALL. CARDINAL RV MANUFACTURER  FORREST RIVER HAS BEEN PLACING RENDA  TIRES ON 5TH WHEELS FOR THIS REASON.. DETERMINED TIRE SIDEWALL FAILURES. KEYSTONE REPLACED ALL 5 TIRES ON  5TH WHEEL IN 2002 .NOW THEY WERE DENYING IT I HAD THE RECEIPT FOR THE TIME  THEY DONE IT .  I WANTED KNOW IF  THESE LT TIRES  WERE LEGAL TO PUT ON TRAILERS VERSA THE ST TRAILER TIRES.  *AK
